data.text: @IDSAInfo @cleverwebber Tell that to my friend WHO has been in the hospital since receiving that booster dose. We need safer options & a real vaccine. https://t.co/H76qSXEkHS

@IDSAInfo Thanks! Key points: SOT, heme cancer, lung tx, anti-CD20 mAB, AIDS: poor humoral responses. Neutralization titers lower in immunocompromised.

Coming next: post-booster response, including T-cell reactivity 💉
@IDSAInfo @cleverwebber "Limitations of this study include lack of assessment of cellular immunity".
